title: I just found these mickey mouse short things on youtube

embed.description: Mickey races to rescue Minnie after he realizes her apartment building is on fire. SUBSCRIBE to get notified when new Disney Shorts videos are posted: http://di.sn/SubscribeDisneyShorts Get more from Disney!

body:
Why the heck did no one tell me these existed?

They're freaking brilliant and not aimed for lil children :l
